entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023
